availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Moses Preston, Jr. (Johnson County, Kentucky, clerk and merchant)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, clerk and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Moses “Coby” Preston, Sr., and Elizabeth Haney Preston. Married to Jane K. Peery Preston. Father of Virginia Preston and John M. Preston. Married to Louisa Hager Preston. Father of Clerk for his father, merchant Moses “Coby” Preston, Sr., in Johnson County in 1850. Merchant in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 81A.

_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Johnson County Wills, Vol. B-F, 1869-1975, p. 137 of 1408 of microfilm (Accessed through ancestry.com on August 5, 2020.
